name: Zot Zoomer
description:
A racing game inspired by F-Zero GX Controls

WASD/arrows to move

Hold Shift to drift

Hold Space to boost

(Controller is supported)

Credits

Hazel Kennedy  -  Team Lead, Technical/3D Artist, Engineer, Sound Designer

Aaron Phung  -  Designer, Gameplay Engineer

Daniel Boghossian  -  Gameplay/Audio Engineer, UI/UX

Joshua Nunez  -  UI/UX Designer/Engineer

Leo Paragili  -  Track Designer

Zane Moore  -  Gameplay/UI/UX Engineer

Made in 7 weeks as part of the VGDC at UCI
